overview: The young girl who works as a waitress in a hotel is harassed and dismissed for not obeying the wishes of her manager, while teacher Abu Farwa (Wahid Saif) and his wife Fekha (Mimi Jamal) run a group of children working in the pickpocket And begging. When her mother gets sick badly and needs a dangerous operation and need a large amount of money to make the teacher work with him in theft and pickpocketing.
title: طريق الشيطان
